column5: Perfect for relocation. My husband and I are looking for someone to rent one large (over 300 sq ft) room with private bathroom/tub/shower in our 5 bed/5 bath house 25 minutes from downtown Dallas located between Mesquite and Forney.  We can make our air mattresses available or you can bring your own bed There is NOT a traditional bed in this large room.
column8: Wesel Micro Ranch: Large Space-Long Term Renter
